import pic from '../images/logoSignUpPage.jpg' import Data from '../data/loginCredentials.json' import { useState } from 'react' export default function SignUpPage(){ var [emailId,setEmailId]=useState("") var [password,setPassword]=useState("") var emailFunction=(e)=>{ setEmailId(e.target.value) } var passwordFunction=(e)=>{ setPassword(e.target.value) } function updateData() { if(emailId!==""&&password!==""){ alert("Sign Up Successful") } else alert("Invalid Credentials") } return( <>

{Data}

); }
